After 1000 I guess I will give this review a spin.
This game ain't for bitches, okay? You are going to lose some games, and that's okay.
Stay focused as a killer, stay cautious but work as a team when you are a survivor. 
There is something about the thrill of the chase...and this game hits all of the check boxes. 
If you are an old school horror nut, like me, you will enjoy the pay to play killers. Watch the sales, don't shop without buying something at half off. I have only sunk 15 extra dollars in DLC and it has stretched out for some time. You can buy a "season pass" after the fact that you have earned all of the season rewards (to see if it is worth it for you that season) and earn back all of or most of the auric cells you bought. Play solo, or play with friends, either way it gets your blood pumping. :) be spooky, be kind, stay safe out there...the entity is watching. ;)

One of my favorite games to play despite a lot of the problems the game has but due to how the game has gone recently in good conscious I cannot recommend it.

Queue times can be ridiculous, especially for killer right now, and every new patch somehow breaks thing unrelated to the patches. The game has a grind that rivals that of the worst MMOs, and this has only been made worse for newer players after the most recent update.

Despite all of that the game isn't horrible. The gameplay is a very fun mixture of tag / hide n seek.

But due to how the game Devs have started treating the community and not following the standards and commitments they have stated they have, I strongly cannot recommend this game. 

Hopefully in the future I can change this review to a positive one.

Почему мои друзья из егс играют отлично, а эти черти из рандома даже палеты cyka скинуть не могут, не говорю уже о палетлупах, это за гранью их понимания.
Спасибо бхвр, за офигительный баланс, на чиле играя с 1 тимейтом можно почти каждую катку сбегать, особенно, если игра против м1 терпилы на большой карте.
За мяньяков же ситуация радикально противоположная, тебе 
на тир 2-3 нужно всю игру очко себе рвать, чтобы сделать -3 (4 просто в люк сбежит, на или до коллапса из-за спавна ворот открыть успеет, 50/50 )
Ах да, спавн, решает просто всё в игре, особенно, когда в мейне появляется абузное окно, а ты играешь без бамбузла.
Можно долго ныть про убермансеров, но даже они не приносят столько проблем, сколько приносят фикусы на сурвах, которые эа 5 минут чинят все гены, пока такой-же фикус скидывает все палеты, а потом, когда уже ловит хит, убегает и хилится от адреналина, замечательно, разработчики настолько классно забалансили манов, что почти на всех собирают одинаковый билд, так как другие перки - юзлесс дерьмо
Не тратьте на это время

Баланса по матчмейкингу в игре нет, абсолютно. Я с 60 часами и бронзой попадаюсь против 1.5к часов красных задротов на сурвах, вследствие чего играть невозможно. Так же огромные кол-ва читеров, которых не кикает, даже за самые палевный софт. Игра кал, не рекомендую. 1/10, единичка только за то, что в игре есть буба, сначала хотел поставить два, но разрабы убрали маски #freebubba
I really liked the aesthetic and the game play

Over all its a good game, but if you will like it or not depends on how are you, i would recommend it to someone who doesnt care about losing, because, even if you do every thing perfectly, you will lose. The community is disgusting, as you get better it gets worse, and full of cheaters.
I would ONLY recommend this game to you if you want to play in a non competitive way, otherwise you will regret it. Just play, be chased or chase survs, lose, and get ready for another lost match.
Dont expect it to change for better, it just wont happen.
I recommend also to playing while listening to music, it helps a lot at keeping you out of a competitive playstyle.
Have fun.

A positive review was earned by this developer team, but one of the developers felt very small and personally offended by the criticism offered by a popular YouTuber and steamer. So they spent hours and hours, of paid developer time to remove a cosmetic from them... waste of time and a waste of resources. Give him his twitch t-shirts back and I will give you back your positive review back.

With a good conscience I can no longer recommend this game. Behaviour Interactive have somehow been able to take a game I love and turn it into a game that feels more frustrating to play than enjoyable. Que times are terrible for survivor, and killers deal with tbagging asshats who are the same ones complaining about their 15 minute que times. SBMM is horrendous and the overall health of this game is at an all time low with the boring meta, toxic players, and a general negative future for the game in its current trajectory. The negatives far outweigh the positives and for that reason I would stay away all you potential new players.
Potential to be one of the best asymmetrical Horror game but Devs don't care  to fix the game and would rather just keep selling new killers as DLC

I've been holding off on reviewing this game for a long time, because I go through phases of where I like it a little bit and then I absolutely hate it. I now loathe this game, or at least its development team and the way they handle it and its community. 

If you say one negative or critical thing about the game and its core balance (terrible by the way) you're likely to get banned. They're very quickly running out of good will with their community, especially after taking away cosmetics from Twitch streamers for being critical, and they've also managed to piss off one of their biggest content creators with their poor choices. Their "Q & A" sessions are more like "No no no you're wrong, we're right, shut up and play something else if you don't like it!!!" sessions. There's only two or three good devs on this team, the rest feel like the most overly sensitive children I have ever seen. It's completely drained me of any desire to play this game. They make pointless, ineffective changes and expect to get a round of applause for doing either absolutely nothing or for doing BENEATH the bare minimum. The game is incredibly one-sided and mostly tilted in the survivors' favor because of these unbalanced perks and metas.

This game has become a joke and it's too hard to find enjoyment from it, and if the devs were smart and mature, they'd stop crying about bullies and banning people, and instead actually listen to their community and put in the effort to make this game enjoyable for both Killers and Survivors.

Not to mention the other plethora of issues this game carries with itself, but I don't need to repeat what's already been said again, [i]and again[/i], [i][b]and again.[/b][/i]
